author: psmith
msg: Added accelerator to the toggle of the Logger tree (ALT-T), plus updated

rather than the magnify icon, as this is more intuitive.
Will use the Magnify etc icons for a "Focus On.." concept

author: ceki
msg: Added more files to ignore in .cvsignore

msg: Joran can now configure loggers and set their levels. (It still cannot
configure appenders or attach them to loggers.)
